DataElement.preferredName: Occupational Or Chemical Exposure History Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of chemicals and/or occupational hazards other than the one(s) previously specified that an individual has been subjected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The exposure to potentially harmful agents that occurs as a result of one's occupation._A record of the individual's history of exposure to chemicals and/or occupational hazard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The exposure to potentially harmful agents that occurs as a result of one's occupation.

Concepts.definition: The exposure to potentially harmful agents that occurs as a result of one's occupation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A record of the individual's history of exposure to chemicals and/or occupational hazard.

Concepts.definition: A record of the individual's history of exposure to chemicals and/or occupational hazard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.
